name: Redneck Rampage: Possum Bayou
description: Redneck Rampage is back in Possum Bayou. You play as Redneck aliens who crashed their ship on earth and now have to shoot their way out. This "sampler" of the game Redneck Rampage has less levels but it is more than a demo,  with 7 levels of Redneck mayhem.  in Possum Bayou enjoy these different types of weapons that exist including crowbars, dynamite, shotguns, electric saw, bowling ball, and others.
